page.title: 03AGRICULTURE- a smallholding.
page.content:
My name is Melissa. Behind our garage is a smallholding. We have pigs, calves, hens and a peafowl. We keep the pigs to breed from; later on we wean them and eventually sell them. My Dad feeds the pigs and my Mum the calves and the hens. The shed that the animals are kept in is long and tall with a loft, in which we keep all the hay and straw. My Dad feeds the pigs on sour milk which comes from the dairy; fresh milk is fed to the calves.
I just like watching and messing about! I have a pet cockerel called Maggie which sits on my head.
